trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation" /> namespace contains interfaces that components use to access type information and invoke type members.
trans-unit.target: O namespace <see cref="N:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation" /> contém interfaces que os componentes usam para acessar informações de tipo e invocar membros de tipo.

trans-unit.source: Use the interfaces in the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace to enable components to access type information for a remote object without having direct access to the <xref:System.Type> of the remote object.
trans-unit.target: Usa as interfaces no <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace habilitar componentes para acessar as informações de tipo para um objeto remoto sem ter acesso direto para o <xref:System.Type> do objeto remoto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace defines reflection functionality for components that use the interfaces and structures in the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespaces to communicate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace define a funcionalidade de reflexão para componentes que usam as interfaces e estruturas no <xref:System.AddIn.Contract?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation?displayProperty=nameWithType>, e <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespaces para se comunicar.

trans-unit.source: The interfaces in these namespaces are also called contracts.
trans-unit.target: As interfaces nesses namespaces, também são chamadas de contratos.

trans-unit.source: All contracts derive from the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract> interface.
trans-unit.target: Todos os contratos derivam o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract> interface.

trans-unit.source: When using contracts to manage the communication between components, you must implement the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface in a type to expose the type information to other components.
trans-unit.target: Ao usar contratos para gerenciar a comunicação entre componentes, você deve implementar o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface em um tipo para expor as informações de tipo para outros componentes.

trans-unit.source: Components can then access the members of the type by calling the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> method of the interface to get an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract>.
trans-unit.target: Componentes, em seguida, podem acessar os membros do tipo chamando o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> método da interface para obter um <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract>.

trans-unit.source: The other interfaces and structures in the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace provide access to type information for delegates, properties, methods, events, and fields.
trans-unit.target: As outras interfaces e estruturas de <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace fornecem acesso a informações de tipo para campos, propriedades, métodos, eventos e delegados.

trans-unit.source: Components can use the contracts in the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace to access type information for an object that is in a different process or application domain, or in the same process or application domain.
trans-unit.target: Componentes podem usar os contratos no <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace para acessar as informações de tipo para um objeto que está em um domínio de aplicativo ou processo diferente ou o mesmo processo ou o domínio de aplicativo.
